ComicInfo.Summary:
As the chaotic new world around comic shop employee turned other-dimensional vampire slayer, Vampblade, starts to come into focus, things continue to be both crazy-weird and stupid-lethal for our blade-brandishing bad girl! And when you’re a 90s comic book character come to life, meeting your “creator” can be a bit meta too…
Features regular, “goo”, “homage”, “booty”, artist, and “90s cheesecake” variant covers.
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|------------------------------------------------|---------------|------------------| | A | Regular Cover | Winston Young | 1 | | B | Goo Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Winston Young | 2 | | C | Artist Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Jason Martin | 3 | | D | Booty Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Randy Kintz | 4 | | E | Homage Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Edward Pun | 5 | | F | 90's Cheesecake Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Andrew Mangum | 6 |
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Andrew Mangum,Edward Pun,Jason Martin,Randy Kintz,Winston Young
